Name: GDY (Parameter 0 - Duration; Parameter 1 - Horizontal; Parameter 2 - Playalone; Parameter 3 - Reverse; Parameter 4 - Stamp Id; Parameter 5 - Hide Skip Button; Parameter 6 - Hide Next Sentence Button)
Echo
Text: Watch out for the Aurora Squadron over there!

Name: Echo
Text: Why are they here...?

Name: Echo
Text: This is... the tactical analysis lens Dr. Pickman once equipped on me.

Name: Echo
Text: It can get some information of the enemy through analysis.

Name: Echo
Text: But... I haven't used it for a long time.

Name: Echo
Text: Holographic goggles activated!

Name: Echo
Text: Suspicious target found.

Name: Echo
Text: Enlarge the target area. Start analyzing—

Name: Echo
Text: Start comparative analysis.

Name: Echo
Text: Target Model: Aurora Bastion XI.

Name: Echo
Text: Target Charging Status—Remaining Energy: About 75%.

Name: Echo
Text: Target Firepower Status: Unknown.

Name: Echo
Text: Target confirmed. Exiting tactical analysis!

Name: Echo
Text: Target confirmed. On the top of the mountain ahead.

Name: Echo
Text: The Aurora Bastion is very dangerous. We have to destroy it.

Name: Echo
Text: The guards won't come after us as long as we don't alert them.

Name: Echo
Text: We need to save our strength to fight that machine.

Name: Echo
Text: I can't get its firepower status through analysis. What is that thing...?

Name: Echo
Text: How did they manage to get it here...?

Name: Aurora Guard Captain
Text: Tsk... Where did everyone go? Our mission is to get this Aurora Bastion to near the conservation area down there! Not to take a walk!

Name: Aurora Guard Captain
Text: Wait... Hey! You! Over there! Where are you from?

Name: Aurora Guard Captain
Text: ...Intruder! Assemble! Assemble!

Name: Aurora Guard Captain
Text: Protect the Aurora Bastion!

Name: <color=#00CC66>Mission Target</color>
Text: <color=#00CC66>Target Frame: Aurora Bastion XI</color>
<color=#00CC66>Remaining Energy: 75%</color>
<color=#00CC66>Firepower Status: Unknown</color>

Name: <color=#00CC66>Captain</color>
Text: <color=#00CC66>Model: UPA</color>

Name: <color=#00CC66>Member</color>
Text: <color=#00CC66>Model: UPB</color>

Name: Aurora Guard Captain
Text: Damn, no one's here...? No retreat!

Name: Mission Goal
Text: Destroy the Aurora Bastion on top of the mountain.

Name: Mission Goal
Text: Destroy the Aurora Bastion.

Name: Nivi
Text: I still don't think this is a good place...

Name: Nivi
Text: We could've stayed in Babylonia's conservation area.

Name: Nivi
Text: Yes, we have to work for supplies there...

Name: Nivi
Text: But at least they are clean!

Name: Nivi
Text: Things you get without doing anything...

Name: Nivi
Text: Is there really such a thing as a free lunch?

Name: Nivi
Text: Let's go back. It's getting late...

Name: Askr
Text: This is different! They promised us!

Name: Askr
Text: They promised us water, food, and warm clothes...

Name: Askr
Text: I don't wanna go back! I don't want to work so hard for only a few supplies.

Name: Askr
Text: Who cares about justice? I just want free bread!

Name: Nivi
Text: Tate, what about you? Are you staying with Askr here?

Name: Tate
Text: I-I... I don't know...

Name: Tate
Text: But I-I'm starving too...

Name: Nivi
Text: Tate...

Name: Tate
Text: I don't care about those things. I-I just want...

Name: Tate
Text: I just want food. I'm so hungry...

Name: Nivi
Text: Is that... the Babylonia commandant?

Name: Echo
Text: Shh... Quiet. We don't want to get caught by them.

Name: Echo
Text: Let me get you out of here.

Name: Nivi
Text: They... They seem reluctant to leave, but...

Name: Nivi
Text: P-please give me more time. I have to bring them back!

Name: Nivi
Text: I... promised their mother...

Name: Tate
Text: W-who's that? Nivi? Who are these two...?

Name: Askr
Text: They are... from Babylonia!

Name: Askr
Text: Nivi! Why did you do this?

Name: Askr
Text: I have to enter Utopia... no matter what! I'm gonna live the kind of life they described!

Name: Aurora Guard
Text: They are with Babylonia!

Name: Aurora Guard
Text: Don't let them get away alive!

Name: Nivi
Text: The residents they took away are all in this warehouse!

Name: Askr
Text: Help! Help! We have intruders from Babylonia!

Name: Nivi
Text: I can fight! I have to save Askr and Tate...

Name: Nivi
Text: Don't worry about me. I saved up some bandages...

Name: Nivi
Text: Let me help you!

Name: Nivi
Text: I'll stall this one!

Name: Nivi
Text: Thank... Thank you...

Name: Mission Goal
Text: Escort Nivi to the meeting point.

Name: Lee
Text: It's Lee, Commandant. We got in.

Name: Lucia
Text: The enemies down there haven't noticed us. We could attack them off guard.

Name: Lee
Text: Right, as we discussed, I will provide sniping support from a high ground.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv has already come in through another safe passage. I'm going to meet her.

Name: Lee
Text: I'll take care of the escaped enemies if there's gonna be a fight.

Name: Liv
Text: I scanned this place. To decipher the flying fortress' operation data, we'll have to use their central control panel.

Name: Liv
Text: Their central control desk is in the back. I can handle it myself, but I need the enemy's passcodes.

Name: Lucia
Text: Well... Then there has to be a fight if we do that.

Name: Liv
Text: We need at least 5 passcodes to open the gate. The patrol guards should have them... Be careful, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Yeah, I will. You can count on us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Verified!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let me see... Is it File XTY-86?

Name: Lee
Text: Yeah, that's right... Damn! There's another firewall!

Name: Lucia
Text: The alarm won't stop...

Name: Lee
Text: The base guards are approaching!

Name: Lee
Text: Enemies on the second floor. We are surrounded.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's split up! Prepare for breakthrough!

Name: Mission Goal
Text: Be careful. Get the passcodes. A fight is feasible.

Name: Mission Goal
Text: Get enough passcodes. Use the terminal to open the gate.

Name: Mission Goal
Text: Defeat all enemies.
<size=40>Turn on the thruster's sliding mode and move to the next floor</size>

Name: Lee
Text: I'll handle the remaining enemies.

Name: Guard
Text: Who's there?!

Name: Leon
Text: Boss, I knew you'd be fine!

Name: Leon
Text: Other people are still in there.
International Space Station\n10:15
Forsaken Camp, Underground\n18:20

Name: Guard
Text: Enemies incoming!

Name: Suma
Text: Boss, you're finally back!

Name: Leon
Text: Let's teach those traitors a lesson!

Name: Suma
Text: I'm full of anger.

Name: Jada
Text: Be careful, "Tall Guy"...

Name: Philip
Text: We'll stay here...

Name: Manager
Text: It's a ranged part. It's intact.

Name: Drone
Text: (o?v?)ノ

Name: Watanabe
Text: Why is it so less guarded here...?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Find out where they're held first.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Comrades are not here.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Too few guards here...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Perhaps they're not here or... on the ground?

Name: Watanabe
Text: That tent seems redundant... Go have a look.

Name: Watanabe
Text: A cover like I expected...

Name: Watanabe
Text: The entrance to the underground...? They're likely to be in there.

Name: Watanabe
Text: It's more guarded here than above there.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Seems this is the right place.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I can sneak in silently with the scan device.

Name: Watanabe
Text: They're in there.

Name: Leon
Text: Suma and the others!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Here is some equipment. Take it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The exit is over there!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's part when we get out.

Name: Leon
Text: You're going to find Ballard?

Name: Leon
Text: Let's go together!

Name: Watanabe
Text: No. You have a more important mission.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I want you to tell the truth to our comrades.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Too few guards here. Others must have been sent elsewhere by Ballard.

Name: Leon
Text: Aright...

Name: Suma
Text: Boss, we'll wait for you to return in triumph.

Name: Jada
Text: Good luck, "Tall Guy".

Name: Philip
Text: We're counting on you.

Name: Manager
Text: Damn... The others...

Name: Jada
Text: Tall Guy, are you okay?

Name: Philip
Text: There's a fierce battle inside...

Name: Manager
Text: Hang on please...

Name: Jada
Text: Why is this still not over yet...?

Name: Philip
Text: Tall Guy? "Tall Guy"? Damn it... Let me help him!

Name: Manager
Text: You wanna die?

Name: Jada
Text: Seems... quiet now?

Name: Philip
Text: The battle is over?

Name: Manager
Text: Wait... Damn it, what are you doing?

Name: Jada
Text: Open the door!

Text: Reverse

Name: Left
Text: Front

Text: Reverse

Text: Reverse Alone

Text: Reverse

Name: Normal Construct
Text: Normal Construct, facing left

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Construct Captain, facing left

Name: Female Refugee
Text: Female Refugee, facing left

Name: Child Refugee
Text: Child Refugee, facing left

Name: Child Refugee
Text: Child Refugee, facing left

Name: Aurora Agent
Text: Aurora Agent, facing front

Name: Tips
Text: <color=#FFFFFF>Please select one of the following items and press the Confirm button to start the battle.</color>

Name: Tips
Text: <color=#FFFFFF>Please make a choice first!</color>

Name: Weapon
Text: <color=#FFCC99>[Pistol]:</color> Medium firing rate. With piercing shots.

Name: Weapon
Text: <color=#FFCC99>[Katana]:</color> Low firing rate. Deals damage to all nearby enemies.

Name: Weapon
Text: <color=#FFCC99>[Levi-Gun]:</color> Extremely low firing rate. With shots that will explode on hit.

Name: Magic
Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Spinning Fire Orb]:</color> A fire orb circling around the character. It will deal damage to enemies who touch it. Level up to equip the character with more fire orbs.

Name: Magic
Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Lightning Bolt]:</color> A lightning bolt that appears around the character at random intervals and deals damage to the enemy. Level up to increase the frequency and number of lightning bolts.

Name: Add-On Unit
Text: <color=#999999>[ATK]:</color> Increases the character's ATK by half of the value of the add-on's level.

Name: Magic
Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Dark Snake]:</color> Use the Dark Snake to attack nearby enemies and deal Dark DMG. Level up to increase the attack frequency and the number of targets.

Name: Magic
Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Ice Path]:</color> Leaves an ice path while moving, dealing Ice DMG to enemies passing by. Level up to increase the Ice DMG.

Name: Item
Text: <color=#FF99CC>[Sweet Dumpling]:</color> Proudly made by Gray Raven. Restores 30 HP after use.

Name: Item
Text: <color=#FF99CC>[Blade]:</color> Allegedly the Forsaken Leader's knife. Very sharp. Makes the character deals 100% more damage for 30s. Obtain it multiple times to refresh the duration.

Name: Item
Text: <color=#FF99CC>[Crown]:</color> A crown with the ice queen's blessings. Creates an ice shield around the wearer to resist 10 damage for 30s. Obtain it multiple times to refresh the duration.

Name: Add-On Unit
Text: <color=#999999>[DEF]:</color> Increases the character's DEF by half of the value of the add-on's level.

Name: Item
Text: <color=#FF99CC>[Rocket Boots]:</color> Designed and made by the greatest goblin engineer Burp. These seemingly dangerous boots can double your speed for 30s. Obtain it multiple times to refresh the duration.

Name: Add-On Unit
Text: <color=#999999>[Dodge]:</color> Increases the character's dodge charging attempts by one-third of the value the add-on's level.

Name: Item
Text: <color=#FF99CC>[Rose Clock]:</color> A delicate product by rose elf Roseline. Reduces the time the character spends to dodge for 30s. Obtain it multiple times to refresh the duration.

Name: Add-On Unit
Text: <color=#999999>[HP]:</color> Increases the character's Max HP by 10 points per level.

Name: Weapon
Text: <color=#FFCC99>[Bow and Arrow]:</color> Low firing rate. With piercing arrows.

Name: Magic
Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Magic - Acid]</color>:Sprays acid to the area in front. The acid will stay on the ground for a while and corrodes the enemy over time. Level up to reduce the frequency the acid is applied.

Name: Magic
Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Lightning Chain]</color>: Unleashes Lightning Chains to random targets nearby. Level up to increase the number of targets.

Name: Magic
Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Magic - Ice Blast]</color>: Casts Ice Blast to the target, dealing AOE DMG. Level up to reduce Ice Blast's cast frequency.

Name: Magic
Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Magic - Fire Pillar]</color>: Generates Fire Pillars, dealing AOE DMG. Level up to increase the number of Fire Pillars.

Name: Weapon
Text: <color=#FFCC99>[Weapon - Cannon]</color>: Low firing rate. Fires random cannonballs clockwise in the area.
